name: PLYR PHI
description: The PLYR gaming chain offers low-cost, fast, and secure transactions for gaming. It enables seamless in-game purchases, asset transfers, and integrates with over 200 networks, providing a robust foundation for innovative and cross-chain gaming experiences.

chains.name: PLYRPHI
